fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.network.interfaces

Interface SensorNodeP2PImplI

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SensorNodeP2PCI

    public interface SensorNodeP2PImplI
    The interface SensorNodeP2PImplI defines the methods that a sensor node class must implement to act as a part of the sensor network.

    Description

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2023-12-14

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ask4Connection(NodeInfoI neighbour)
      accept a new neighbour and connect back to it.
      void ask4Disconnection(NodeInfoI neighbour)
      disconnect from a neighbour.
      QueryResultI execute(RequestContinuationI request)
      propagate a query to the receiving sensor node.
      void executeAsync(RequestContinuationI requestContinuation)
      propagate a query to the receiving sensor node to pursue its execution given the current execution state given by requestContinuation.

 post    true        // no postcondition.
